description: Add missing story step when domain responsibility has no reflection

examples.description: Identify domain responsibility without story step
examples.content: Responsibility 'Agile Bot: Loads Workflow: Workflow, Bot Config' missing story step - Add 'Agile Bot loads Workflow from Bot Config (ordered Behavior and Actions)' in story 'Initialize Bot For Project'

examples.description: Add story step to appropriate epic and feature
examples.content: Responsibility 'Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action If Done' missing story - Add story 'Bot Tool Determines Active Step To Invoke' with step 'Bot Tool moves Workflow to next action' in feature 'Invoke Bot Tool'

examples.description: Don't leave domain responsibilities without story reflection
examples.content: Responsibility 'Agile Bot: Loads Workflow' should be reflected in at least one story step
